TF029621-PHRD-ANIMAL HUSBANDRY PROJ.(BANK-EXEC.),TF035793-CHINA - SMALLHOLDER CATTLE
            DEVELOPMENT PROJECT,TF029720-PHRD-ANIMAL HUSBANDRY DEV.PROJ.(RECIPIENT-EXEC.)

abstracts.cdata!:
The Smallholder Cattle Development
            Project aims to promote cattle production, marketing, beef
            processing and support service systems in Hebei, Henan,
            Shanxi, and Anhui. For each province, this resettlement
            report includes a resettlement issues matrix, a listing of
            all project sites and uses, and detailed compensation
            budgets. The project is designed to maximize the use of land
            and facilities already in use for cattle production, rather
            than acquiring new sites or facilities. Since beef cattle
            raising does not require expensive arable land, most of the
            land sites have been specifically selected on non-inhabited,
            non-cultivated waste lands or on land already owned by the
            sponsoring production units. No persons are scheduled for
            resettlement. Compensation applies only to compensation for
            newly acquired land to be occupied for project activities.
            All other land to be used for project activities is already
            owned by the project sponsors and does not require
            compensation. In case that resettlement is necessary, this
            report covers the resettlement principles and policy to be
            followed. A land acquisition monitoring structure will be
            set up as part of the overall project management infrastructure.
